title: Dow up 175 points on gains in Dow Inc., Caterpillar stocks
text:
Powered by strong returns for shares of Dow Inc. and Caterpillar, the Dow Jones Industrial Average is up Thursday morning. Shares of Dow Inc. DOW, +2.61% and Caterpillar CAT, +2.51% are contributing to the blue-chip gauge's intraday rally, as the Dow DJIA, +0.82% is trading 175 points higher (0.7%). Dow Inc.'s shares have climbed $1.13 (2.6%) while those of Caterpillar are up $2.90 (2.4%), combining for an approximately 27-point boost for the Dow. Walgreens Boots WBA, +2.22%, Intel INTC, +2.10%, and JPMorgan Chase JPM, +1.94% are also contributing significantly to the gain. A $1 move in any of the index's 30 components equates to a 6.78-point swing.

Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights using data from Dow Jones and FactSet. See our market data terms of use.
